panels.description: List of dashboard alerts for the apartment.
panels.title: Alerts

panels.description:
Current state of the house.  Modes trigger different levels of automation.  Changes in modes are annotated automatically on the graphs.

Possible modes:

Home - Someone is currently home.

Away - Everyone in the house is away.

Night - Everyone is asleep.
panels.title: Current House State

panels.description: Last status of all users in the house

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "presence" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "deviceName", "locationName" LIMIT 1

panels.title: Users

panels.description: The current state of the thermostat.  Either idle, heating, or cooling.
panels.title: Current Thermostat State

panels.description: Average house temperature, in Fahrenheit.
panels.title: Temperature

panels.description: Average house humidity level

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "temperature" WHERE deviceName = "Nest Thermostat - Den"

panels.title: Humidity

panels.description: Current Carbon Monoxide Status for the house.
panels.title: Carbon Monoxide Status

panels.description: Levels of Batteries for different IOT devices

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "battery" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "deviceName" LIMIT 1

panels.title: Battery Levels

panels.description: Current state of all locks
panels.title: Doors

panels.description: Status of all windows in the house.
panels.title: Window Status

alert.message: One or more doors have been left open.  Please investigate.
alert.name: Doors are left open

panels.description: Graph of all door states.  0 means locked.
panels.title: Doors

panels.description:
Brightness of the lights, in percentage.  

Currently not displaying what I want, as lights that are "off" just show their last brightness, instead of "0%".  Might remove because of it.

targets.query: SELECT mean("valueBinary") FROM "switch" WHERE ("deviceName" =~ /Lights/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "deviceName" fill(null)

panels.title: Light Levels

alert.message: TV has been on for too long.  Turn it off and go outside!
alert.name: TV is on for too long

panels.description: What "mode" the TV is in, aka what Harmony activity is on.  Should default to "Echo" when I am home and awake, and all modes should be "off" when asleep or away.
panels.title: TV State

panels.description: Current light states for each room.
panels.title: Light State

panels.description: Table of last smoke alarm status.
panels.title: Smoke Alarms

panels.description: Lux Levels of each room.
panels.title: Lux

panels.description: Power draw of outlets, in Watts (W).
panels.title: Power Outlets

panels.description: Power used over time, in Kilowatt-Hour
panels.title: Power Consumption

panels.description: Breakdown on the current cost of each power outlet
panels.title: Power Cost

panels.description: The current state of the thermostat.  Either idle, heating, or cooling.
panels.title: Current Thermostat State

panels.description:
Mode the thermostat is set to.

Heat - Just heat if below a threshold

Cool - Just cool if above a threshold

Auto - Heat if below a threshold or Cool is above a threshold

Off - Thermostat is off
panels.title: Current Thermostat Mode

panels.description:
Shows the current state of the HVAC's fan

Auto - Automatic Fan Mode

On - Fan is On
panels.title: Current Thermostat Fan Mode

alert.message: Apartment temperature is getting too hot or too cold.  Please investigate.
alert.name: Apartment too hot/cold

panels.description:
Graph of the apartment's temperature and heating/cooling thresholds.

Temperature - The apartment's measured temperature

Cooling Threshold - When the temperature is above this, HVAC enters 'cooling' mode

Heating Threshold - When the temperature is below this, HVAC enters 'heating' mode
panels.title: Temperature and Thresholds

panels.description: Graph of the house's humidity, in percentage
panels.title: Humidity

panels.description: Graph of the house's temperature per room.
panels.title: Temperatures per Room

panels.description: Graph of the house's humidity per room.
panels.title: Humidity per Room

panels.description: Temperature, broken down by location.
panels.title: Temperature

panels.description: Humidity, broken down by location.
panels.title: Humidity

alert.message: The percentage of time the HVAC is heating/cooling is >8% over 24 hours, which is too high.  Investigate and readjust thermostat rules.
alert.name: Heating/cooling usage

panels.description:
Shows the state of the thermostat over time. 

Idle - HVAC is off

Heating - HVAC is heating

Cooling - HVAC is cooling
panels.title: Thermostat State

panels.description: Fan activity over time
panels.title: Fan Activity

alert.message: One or more of your device's batteries are low.  Please investigate and replace.
alert.name: Battery Levels Are Low

panels.description: Battery Levels for any devices that run off a battery.
panels.title: Battery Levels
